channel.title: Administration on PrestaShop Specs
channel.description: Recent content in Administration on PrestaShop Specs

item.title: Administration Page
item.description: SPECIFICATIONS - ADMINISTRATION PAGE General [TO BE COMPLETED] Addons API stability channel. Available in development environment only, starting from PrestaShop 1.7.8, cf. issue #18273. It is a dropdown selector containing three options to let the users choose what kind of stability level they want to use for their Addons modules: Stable Alpha Beta By default, the Stable option is selected. A tooltip is available, Choose a stability level for the modules downloaded from Addons Marketplace.
